quest.name: Small Nuisances
journal:
 Quest Sync
Walmet is missing a Mystel.
objectives: Retrieve the sopping sacks of supplies.
Deliver the sopping sacks of supplies to the missing Mystel.

dialogue.name: WALMET
dialogue.text: Where is that Mystel? He should have been back by now...

dialogue.name: WALMET
dialogue.text: I sent one of our newcomers to retrieve the supplies we had chilling in the river, and he has yet to return. I hope he hasn't run into trouble with the local dwarf clan...

dialogue.name: WALMET
dialogue.text: If your travels take you in that direction, could you keep an eye out for our missing Mystel?

dialogue.name: WALMET
dialogue.text: The newcomer─I've forgotten his name─was only meant to grab the sacks we had chilling upriver, then come straight back. I hope nothing bad has befallen him...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Mystel appears in need of a solid pat on the back.

dialogue.name: MYSTEL03539
dialogue.text: Th-Thank you! I think...<huff>...I can breathe again...

dialogue.name: MYSTEL03539
dialogue.text: I was just on my way back to the village when some Goggs started yelling at me. They were certainly cross about something, so I just ran away as fast as my feet would carry me...in the wrong direction, as it turns out.

dialogue.name: MYSTEL03539
dialogue.text: Before I knew it, I'd collapsed here on the riverbank and dropped all my sacks into the water. They must've floated downstream, but I'm still...<puff>...too buggered...to go look for them...

dialogue.name: MYSTEL03539
dialogue.text: Ugh, my chest...<huff>...is still heaving... I hope those sacks...<gasp>...don't get washed...over the falls...

dialogue.name: MYSTEL03539
dialogue.text: I must say, this is a welcome relief! Let's just take a quick peek inside to see that everything's still─

dialogue.name: MYSTEL03539
dialogue.text: Bah, I knew it! Only the wine's missing, and that means dwarves. They must've followed me...

dialogue.name: MYSTEL03539
dialogue.text: Well, I'd best hurry home before I cross paths with them again. You should come too─no good deed should go unrewarded, after all!

dialogue.name: MYSTEL03539
dialogue.text: Thank you again for your help. If you'd not found me, I might have fallen prey to some wild beast─or worse, a party of wine-drunk Goggs.

dialogue.name: MYSTEL03539
dialogue.text: If only they were more like the Tholls. At least we can live alongside those dwarves in some semblance of harmony.

dialogue.name: MYSTEL03539
dialogue.text: Anyway, here's the reward I promised you!

dialogue.name: WALMET
dialogue.text: Thank you for finding our wayward Mystel. Were it not for you, he may have fallen in after the supplies and been washed away downriver!
